@TheProspect1 @ExeterCouncil Thanks for alerting us. We are aware of nest and have temporarily lowered retained water level to protect it. The water chute enables eels and other fish migrating up channel to move over the weir.

Via the NEW Diglis fish pass, twaite shad can now swim past #Worcester on their #SevernShadRun for the first time in nearly 180yrs! üéâüêüüéâ 
Please watch & share our video! #FollowTheShad #FishMigration @CanalRiverTrust @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @HeritageFundM_E @LIFEprogramme https://t.co/kzh7NFPljc

9.5.21- got moved to telford hospital on Friday after a baaad time. no landfill gas, labour stopped again but lost my waters this time so I‚Äôm now here as an inpatient away from my daughter for up to 6 weeks, until he‚Äôs here.

urls.title: Sudden infant death syndrome: the colon connection - PubMed
urls.description: The etiology of sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS) is not known. Various maternal and infant risk factors have been identified. Adoption of the non-prone position has reduced the incidence of SIDS but has not eliminated the problem. Some sulfate reducing bacteria in the colon produce hydrogen sulfi ‚Ä¶
